QuestData.Title: The Black Shield
QuestData.Description: I'm sorry I can't be of much help, $n, but I can refer you to someone who would be. Caz Twosprocket, one of our best blacksmiths, works the forge at the smithy.$b$bTake the shield to him, and see what he can tell you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Blackened Iron Shield to Caz Twosprocket in Theramore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Something for me to look at?
QuestData.RewardText: Hm... interesting piece of iron you have here. Definitely not made by any of the blacksmiths I know over on this side of the sea, and it's certainly not my work.
